summary: This document details the activities of the Directorio Revolucionario Estudiantil (DRE), a student resistance organization in Habana, including its leadership, propaganda efforts, and fundraising activities. It also mentions bombings at the University of Habana and the fortification of the Alturas del Bosque area by the Cuban government. Additionally, it discusses the limited number of Cuban air force jets observed in the air.
title: Activity of Directorio Revolucionario Estudiantil (DRE) and Cuban Military Observations
